ComicInfo.Title: The Snowballing Callback of Defective Products; If Famous People Had Listened to Their Mothers; Take the Cracked Driving Test!; What If They...; Famous Scenes from Great Jungle-Type Movies (That Just Missed); Sylvester Meets the Mets; Cracked Goes to the Hospital; Some Cracked Franchises; Exciting Games for Daredevils; Escape to Golf Course; Loathe Story
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Sylvester goes to see the New York Mets play in Chicago.
Hudd and Dini escape into a golf course but a golf ball knocks them both unconscious.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:44:16. [Issue ID 250455]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,Bob Taylor,John Severin,Tony Tallarico,John Langton,Vic Martin
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,Bob Taylor,John Severin,Tony Tallarico,John Langton,Vic Martin
